name: A Flicker of Light
description:
DOES NOT SUPPORT ENGLISH FOR NOW, BUT WILL DO SOON.

A catastrophe swept across the world. By an accident, my family and I were caught in a whirlpool of crime. How should I struggle to get out and save everything I cherish... or carry up all the sins I've done and keep going?

Play as an ordinary citizen, Eason Syfran. Experience his story of fighting against the almost established fate, in the catastrophic Aulron city.
"We shall meet in the place where there's no darkness."
Make your choice: dance with the hidden crime syndicate, or bury it with your own hands.
Enjoy this visual novel with more than 150k words, within 5-6 hours of playthrough time.
